name: Temptations X
description:
Bringing back the classic memorize and repeat color match gameplay with high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements.

  • 15 challenging levels
  • Uncensored content
  • Beat the record times to earn stars
  • Realistic graphics
  • Atmospheric music
  • 30 achievements
  • Display girls from the gallery
